unittitle_ssm: Mortimer D. Jones collection on the Kings County Hospital
abstract_ssm: The collection contains an assortment of items relating to Kings County Hospital, dating from 1903 to the 1930s. It includes photographs, clippings, ephemera, and a history of the hospital.
